title: Really bad ping?
body: Has anyone else been getting really bad recently? My ping used to be 50ish consistently before pre-season, but now it just keeps spiking to a horrendous like 800. It's not at any real specific time, it just is.

replies.body: That's really high!  When you get a chance, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get an overview of your network issue.  Let me know what you find!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EEXOM8B2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-09T22:29:39.782+0000)
>
> That's really high!  When you get a chance, run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get an overview of your network issue.  Let me know what you find!

Well, overall my connection score was a 0. You can imagine what the graphs looked like with that. All over the places and shitty.

Ouch, yeah!  >.<  Hop in customs for now and run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network settings.  Our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) might help as well by auto-configuring your firewall settings in case that might be a culprit.  let me know if that helps.
